languages.text: "Меня должным образом готовили к тому, чтобы выносить решения в спорных ситуациях. Но этот суд... был бы настоящим вызовом. Не только для меня, но и для моего покойного наставника Теобальда".

traits.locale_text: "Меня должным образом готовили к тому, чтобы выносить решения в спорных ситуациях. Но этот суд... был бы настоящим вызовом. Не только для меня, но и для моего покойного наставника Теобальда".

languages.text: "My tutelage prepared me to make decisions in contentious situations. But that trial... would have proved a challenge. To me, and to my late mentor, Theobald, as well."
languages.original_text: "Меня должным образом готовили к тому, чтобы выносить решения в спорных ситуациях. Но этот суд... был бы настоящим вызовом. Не только для меня, но и для моего покойного наставника Теобальда".

traits.locale_text: "I was tutored on how to make decisions in contentious situations. But that trial... would have proved a challenge. To me, or to my late mentor, Theobald."
"I was tutored on how to make decisions in contentious situations. But that trial... would have proved a challenge. To me, or to my late mentor, Theobald."
"My tutelage prepared me to make decisions in contentious situations. But that trial... would have proved a challenge. To me, and to my late mentor, Theobald, as well."
"My tutelage prepared me to make decisions in contentious situations. But that trial... would have proved a challenge. To me, and to my late mentor, Theobald, as well."
"My tutelage prepared me to make decisions in contentious situations. But that trial... would have proved a challenge. To me, and to my late mentor, Theobald, as well."
"My tutelage prepared me to make decisions in contentious situations. But that trial... would have proved a challenge. To me, and to my late mentor, Theobald, as well."

languages.text: 「修業は、対立を含む状況でも判断を下せるように鍛えてくれました。ですが、あの審問は…あたくしにとっても、そして今は亡き師シオボールドにとっても、試練となったことでしょう」
languages.original_text: "My tutelage prepared me to make decisions in contentious situations. But that trial... would have proved a challenge. To me, and to my late mentor, Theobald, as well."

traits.locale_text: 「修業は、対立を含む状況でも判断を下せるように鍛えてくれました。ですが、あの審問は…あたくしにとっても、そして今は亡き師シオボールドにとっても、試練となったことでしょう」

languages.text: "Meine Ausbildung hat mich darauf vorbereitet, in strittigen Situationen Entscheidungen zu treffen. Doch dieser Prozess ... wäre eine Herausforderung gewesen. Für mich und auch für meinen verstorbenen Mentor Theobald."
languages.original_text: "My tutelage prepared me to make decisions in contentious situations. But that trial... would have proved a challenge. To me, and to my late mentor, Theobald, as well."

traits.locale_text: "Meine Ausbildung hat mich darauf vorbereitet, in strittigen Situationen Entscheidungen zu treffen. Doch dieser Prozess ... wäre eine Herausforderung gewesen. Für mich und auch für meinen verstorbenen Mentor Theobald."

languages.text: « Mon éducation m'a préparée à prendre des décisions dans des situations contentieuses, mais ce procès... aurait été difficile. Pour moi comme pour feu mon mentor, Théobald. »
languages.original_text: "My tutelage prepared me to make decisions in contentious situations. But that trial... would have proved a challenge. To me, and to my late mentor, Theobald, as well."

traits.locale_text: « Mon éducation m'a préparée à prendre des décisions dans des situations contentieuses, mais ce procès... aurait été difficile. Pour moi comme pour feu mon mentor, Théobald. »

languages.text: «Mi instrucción me ha preparado para tomar decisiones en situaciones conflictivas. Pero ese juicio... me habría supuesto un desafío. A mí y a mi difunto mentor, Theobald».
languages.original_text: "My tutelage prepared me to make decisions in contentious situations. But that trial... would have proved a challenge. To me, and to my late mentor, Theobald, as well."

traits.locale_text: «Mi instrucción me ha preparado para tomar decisiones en situaciones conflictivas. Pero ese juicio... me habría supuesto un desafío. A mí y a mi difunto mentor, Theobald».

languages.text: “我接受的教育可以帮助我在有争议的情况下做出决定，但那场审判……确实是个挑战。无论是对我而言，还是对我已故的西奥巴德而言，都是如此。”
languages.original_text: "My tutelage prepared me to make decisions in contentious situations. But that trial... would have proved a challenge. To me, and to my late mentor, Theobald, as well."

traits.locale_text: “我接受的教育可以帮助我在有争议的情况下做出决定，但那场审判……确实是个挑战。无论是对我而言，还是对我已故的西奥巴德而言，都是如此。”

languages.text: "Çekişmeli durumlarda karar alabilmek üzere eğitim aldım. Fakat eminim ki o duruşma, hem beni hem de rahmetli yönderim Theobald'ı epey zorlardı."
languages.original_text: "My tutelage prepared me to make decisions in contentious situations. But that trial... would have proved a challenge. To me, and to my late mentor, Theobald, as well."

traits.locale_text: "Çekişmeli durumlarda karar alabilmek üzere eğitim aldım. Fakat o duruşma, hem beni hem de rahmetli yönderim Theobald'ı epey zorlardı, eminim."

languages.original_text: "My tutelage prepared me to make decisions in contentious situations. But that trial... would have proved a challenge. To me, and to my late mentor, Theobald, as well."
